alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:26PM CDT until July 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ansley, or 17 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ansley, Mason City and Gavin Siding. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 83 and 97. Highway 2 between mile markers 292 and 307. Highway 92 between mile markers 300 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
